article_title: CVS Smoke-Free Pharmacy Benefit Excludes Tobacco-Selling Rivals

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: CVS Health (CVS) confirmed its Caremark pharmacy benefit management subsidiary would sell a smoke-free drugstore network to employers and health plans that would provide subscriber discounts for using “tobacco-free” pharmacies. The move, which would benefit CVS Health pharmacies given the company's decision to stop selling tobacco, could at the same time [...]
